name: Tencent
title: AI Consolidation Under Unified TEG Departments

classification.classificationRationale: Validated Model 4 (Hub-and-Spoke). Tencent consolidated previously scattered AI teams (Hunyuan, AI Lab, ML Platform) into unified departments in TEG: AI Infra Department, AI Data Department, and Data Computing Platform. This is a clear restructuring from distributed/embedded to centralized hub-and-spoke. Chief AI Scientist Yao Shunyu (ex-OpenAI) placed in CEO/President's Office signals strategic importance. Structural orientation: dedicated centralized AI departments separated from business groups.

description:
Tencent's AI restructuring represents a direct response to competitive pressure in the Chinese AI race. Previously, the Hunyuan model R&D teams and resources were scattered across different business groups — spanning Large Language Model, AI Lab, and Machine Learning Platform departments — leading to unfocused R&D efforts and resource waste.

The reorganization established unified departments within TEG (Technology & Engineering Group): AI Infra Department, AI Data Department, and Data Computing Platform. The objective shifted explicitly from 'simply inventing AI' (traditional lab mission) to manufacturing and deploying AI at industrial scale.

A key structural signal was hiring Yao Shunyu (former OpenAI researcher) as Chief AI Scientist, placed in the CEO/President's Office rather than in an engineering division. This appointment rapidly attracted core employees from ByteDance, Alibaba, and other competitors, demonstrating how a single strategic hire can shift talent dynamics.
